pages.title: Sanguinem Faith
pages.text: Found by $(item)Killing$() a $(item)Blood Raven$() in a $(item)Blessed Plains$() biome.$(br2)This faith is built around making $(item)Sacrifices$() to the$(br)$(item)Old Gods$(), this can either be done by drawing your own $(item)Blood$(), or the $(item)Blood$() of others.
This knowledge is required before you can make a $(l:sim_2/3_vein_tapping)Blood Altar$() aswell as the$(br)$(l:sim_2/3_vein_tapping#dagger)Sacrificial Dagger$().
You can learn more about $(item)Blood Magic$() by reading the Sanguine Scientem.
